const response = await client.search({
  query: {
    match: {
      message: {
        operator: "or",
        query: "the quick brown",
      },
    },
  },
  rescore: [
    {
      window_size: 100,
      query: {
        rescore_query: {
          match_phrase: {
            message: {
              query: "the quick brown",
              slop: 2,
            },
          },
        },
        query_weight: 0.7,
        rescore_query_weight: 1.2,
      },
    },
    {
      window_size: 10,
      query: {
        score_mode: "multiply",
        rescore_query: {
          function_score: {
            script_score: {
              script: {
                source: "Math.log10(doc.count.value + 2)",
              },
            },
          },
        },
      },
    },
  ],
});
console.log(response);
